scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/domain --if-present && npm run build --workspace=packages/sync --if-present && npm run build --workspace=packages/application --if-present && npm run build --workspace=packages/ui-core --if-present && npm run build --workspace=packages/api-client --if-present && npm run build --workspace=packages/offline-core --if-present && npm run build --workspace=packages/app-core --if-present && npm run build --workspace=packages/crdt --if-present
scripts.build:pwa: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/pwa
scripts.build:api: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/api
